overview: Take a wild ride through God’s Word with Chadder Chipmunk! Join Chadder as he learns to become a real cowboy at Horsefeathers Dude Ranch—where he makes new friends, escapes from a wagon going over a cliff, and outwits the crazy cattle rustlers. It’s a wild celebration and a wacky adventure as Chadder discovers that Jesus truly is our forever friend.
title: Chadder's Wild West Adventure
